appId.description: The ID of the HubSpot application that triggered the webhook

objectId.description: The ID of the object that was created

eventId.description: A unique identifier for this event

sourceId.description: Identifies the source of the change (e.g. userId:12345)

changeFlag.description: The type of change (e.g. CREATED, UPDATED, DELETED)

occurredAt.description: Unix timestamp in milliseconds when the event occurred

changeSource.description: The source of the change (e.g. CRM_UI, API, IMPORT)

objectTypeId.description: The type ID of the object (e.g. 0-1 for contacts)

attemptNumber.description: The number of times HubSpot has attempted to deliver this webhook

subscriptionId.description: The ID of the webhook subscription

subscriptionType.description: The type of subscription (e.g. object.creation, object.propertyChange)
